website_summaries.verdict: For those searching for a very unique graduation party favor, a small succulent would certainly be memorable.
pros: Each plant arrives in its own prepared pot with a gift box
Guests will enjoy this party favor for years
Can be personalized with name tags for each guest
cons: Actual plants may not resemble product photos

customer_reviews.title: DID not arrive as described on Amazon, DO NOT PURCHASE! Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought these small succulents with beautiful little pots for my office window while working from home everyday. They arrived completely mangled and with broken pots, both of which I had to immediatly replace. I would absolutely not recommend purchasing these. They were not shipped with enough padding and material to protect them on their shipping journey.
customer_reviews.author: jennie serle

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: The little succulents are so cute, I am really hoping they make it, when they arrived both were out of their pots with dirt everywhere and extremely dry. I am not really sure if it is the shipper or ups at fault but I hope they both make it. I have added a picture, the ripped box in the background is from me opening it. After potting and watering they however are very beautiful sitting on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: CCD760

customer_reviews.title: Transportation doesn't agree with these plants
customer_reviews.text: The plants arrived is disarray. As per the instructions, I was hopeful the plants would revive. Unfortunately,only one survived ultimately. It's a shame because so far the surviving plant seems to be thriving. Wishing the other one pulled through.
customer_reviews.author: jodi vachon

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 packs of these (4 total) only 1 came as pictured. The rest were 2 like the one in the picture and the last one was the ugliest super small little tree. I bought these to give for teachers appreciation day and it looks like i will need to go out and find another gift last minute because only 1 was sent as shown. They were also packaged badly. They all came with dirt spilled everywhere and the tips of the leaves all broken. The vase it comes in, is good quality though. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: xiomara bueno

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, difficult delivery
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy to find a succulent combined with decorative pot. Understandably they did not travel well. All the dirt was tipped out and both plants were badly damaged. I was able to nurse them back to health once repotted
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: High hopes but was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with my purchase, this was a gift for Mother’s Day. The box arrived with dirt scattered all over and the poor plants not in the planters. One of the planters was cracked, as you can see in the photos. I was going to return but the poor plants deserve to be potted instead of shipped back to die.
customer_reviews.author: theonegirl

customer_reviews.title: First plants i ever bought. Didn't end well.
customer_reviews.text: They looked lovely at first, one seemed to be a little wrinkled and soft. After about a month however they both died. They were gorgeous, but i think maybe the soil was too packed in, and wouldn't allow the water to drain. One of the plants was clearly in pretty bad shape when we got it, but the rose succulent seemed okay for a month or so. I think maybe i over watered the rosette succulent, so that's my fault. In short they're very gorgeous large plants, with cute pots, and i think if you examine them right when you get them, you'll know how to help them and they may be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them,and all my guest do too, my daughters have tried to beg me for them ,NOPE THERE MINE😀🤗
customer_reviews.text: The cutest, and perfect decor in ny kitchen. u dont even have to mess with them but every other month ,put a tad bit of water , very little. and that's it , and they are the cutest ,specially on a corner shelf
customer_reviews.author: TamTam

customer_reviews.title: arrived live, promptly died
customer_reviews.text: they should not be hard to keep alive I live in a semitropical place where succulents grow naturally. should have bought off craigslist I guess
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cute pots, but the one succulent was broken in several pieces. Plants were toss about in the box and dirt was everywhere. Had to replace the one.
customer_reviews.author: fdancer24

customer_reviews.title: Succulent in terrible condition
customer_reviews.text: Succulent plants arrived in a total mess. Dirt was everywhere, plant was no longer potted. What’s most upsetting is that one of the succulents is rotted, and was completely detached from its stem when I opened the box. Not salvageable, highly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: These came packaged pretty well! One of the plants dirt had partially fallen out and some of the leaves were broken. Other than that they were fine! They look real cute in my 3-tier organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Broken In Pieces. No Returns!
customer_reviews.text: Both bases came broken in pieces. And guess what? Item isn't eligible for return. Sweet
customer_reviews.author: Emily L.

customer_reviews.title: Mother's Day
customer_reviews.text: Mailed these to my mom for Mother's Day and they are perfect! Great size and she has put them on her mantle to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Capitalgirl06

customer_reviews.title: Plants are great. Pots way too small
customer_reviews.text: The plants were health buy way to big for the pots. The pots were nice but had to put the plants immediately in bigger pots. So the pots are pretty much useless. Would appreciate if the pots were bigger. Too much money for having to buy bigger pots to replant.
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: Have as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave them as a gift and didn’t see them. I was told they were beautiful and that she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Not You

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are the perfect addition to our bookcase! Living in a small city apartment, it’s really hard to find the space and adequate sunlight (hello Chicago winters) for many plants. But these succulents are super low maintenance and add the perfect pop of color. Plus they came via prime’s fast shipping and were already potted into adorable ceramic pots that already have the necessary watering holes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to medicate a succulent..
customer_reviews.text: The plants do not seem to be doing well. Many petals had fallen off into the bottom of the box. The edges seem to be dying and the plant is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Turner

customer_reviews.title: Died
customer_reviews.text: The one plant is super cute. The other one arrived and within 24 hours turned black. I had hoped to revive it, but no such luck....
customer_reviews.author: farmmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for office
customer_reviews.text: Cute and helps brighten my desk at work up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The plants are cute and the perfect size I was looking for. Upon opening the package one plant was completely removed from the vase and the other vase was shattered in to pieces. Perhaps it was a UPS issue but unfortunately I am going to have to replant and find a new home for one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great of all!
customer_reviews.text: It delivered with great care packaging. Plants were in excellent condition. Vases are so cute. I purchased these plants to give some life to my work desk. Plants are doing great consider not much a natural sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Adorable succulents!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the little pots/jars that these came in. My only issue was that one of the plants was completely fallen out of the soil. I’m hoping he doesn’t die on me!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Dalon

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product is adorable but came cracked and they re glued it I mean who does this Now it says it’s not returnable , then give me a refund
customer_reviews.author: orlando berrios

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The dirt was ALL OVER the place... the roots were exposed and almost rotting. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Products damaged
customer_reviews.text: One of the plants came completely damaged whereIt had to be thrown out the other can hopefully be saved. Suggest to change packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lukey

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Inner pot stuck sideways inside outer pot. Outer pot is nice. Had to destroy the plant to use the outer pot for another plant
customer_reviews.author: jesse Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Cute pair
customer_reviews.text: Got here quickly and they look great. Pots have a nice, simple look and go really well with the succulents!
customer_reviews.author: MLi

customer_reviews.title: Mangled succulent
customer_reviews.text: One succulent came fine but the other one was completely mangled with dirt all over the place and the plant not even intact or in the pot anymore. You can see the pieces of it that broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Wieser

customer_reviews.title: cute but broken
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and 1 was out of the pot. When I pulled the plant out, the pot was broken on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Freda

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not healthy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute little pots but the plant came black and possibly molding.
customer_reviews.author: David Polewchak

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a bathroom shelf. Arrived in good condition and were packed well.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Nice plants and containers
customer_reviews.text: Nice pots and good quality succulents. Great varieties were sent
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: These were packed great, came in three days and are really cute!
customer_reviews.author: TRACY A RUSSELL

customer_reviews.title: Nice producr
customer_reviews.text: The ones that survived shipping looked great...too bad they didnt all make it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Pots
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to receiving these and was so disappointed to find the pots broken into pieces. I now see there are many reviews stating the same thing so I don’t understand why they don’t fix this problem. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful package and product - Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in June 2020 for my Mom's birthday and here are the pictures she sent me when they arrived. They are both broken, have spots on the leaves, and are incredibly sick looking. I'm very disappointed as I was trying to surprise my mom for her birthday. I'm currently seeking a refund. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sternke

customer_reviews.title: Broken pot
customer_reviews.text: The plants are lovely, but one pot was shattered during delivery and I see no way for requesting a replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: James V.

product_meta.title: Plants by Post 3.5" Mini Live Succulent Geometric Ceramic Pot (Set of 2), White Geo
product_meta.description: Color:White GeoPerfect as a gift or an accent to brighten up your home, This set of two mini ceramic pots paired with a live 2.5" Succulents comes planted & ready to be loved. White ceramic pots provide a beautiful accent to each unique plant & come with drainage holes to optimize plant health. Both pots come shipped together with each pot in individual cardboard gift boxes. Surprise your friends & loved ones with an easy-to-care-for live plant gift that will bring an uplifting charm to their home or office.
feature_bullets: Set of 2 mini ceramic pots comes with live succulents planted inside.
Each pot comes with an individual gift box and it’s own unique live succulent.
Popular for their low maintenance, succulents only need to be watered the soil had become completely dry.
Hardy in zones 9-11, these succulents can be placed outdoors as well as indoors.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars78 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
